LabelText: Describe the activity indicating potential lateral movement (remote logins, SMB, RDP, etc.)
Identify source and destination hosts involved in the suspicious connections
Verify whether the connections align with normal user or service behavior
Isolate compromised or suspicious hosts from the network if malicious activity is confirmed
Collect host logs, EDR telemetry, and network captures for affected systems
Check for credential dumping tools or abnormal account usage on affected systems
Reset credentials for accounts used in lateral movement activity
Harden remote access protocols (RDP, SSH, SMB) and enforce MFA where possible
Monitor the environment for continued lateral movement attempts
